mapper.select: select c.course_id,c.course_code, c.course_name,c.video, h.last_stamp as last_stamp, c.structure_id,c.teacher, c.play_num,c.duration, c.sequence,c.description, c.cover,c.price, c.exam_id,c.create_by,c.create_date from tb_course c left join (SELECT t2.course_id,t2.last_stamp from (SELECT course_id,max(create_date) create_date FROM tb_history where create_by = #{userId} GROUP BY course_id) t1 LEFT JOIN tb_history t2 ON t1.course_id = t2.course_id AND t1.create_date = t2.create_date) h on c.course_id = h.course_id where c.structure_id = #{structureId} and c.status = ${0} ORDER BY sequence asc

select c.course_id,c.course_code, c.course_name,c.video, h.last_stamp as last_stamp, c.structure_id,c.teacher, c.play_num,c.duration, c.sequence,c.description, c.cover,c.price, c.exam_id,c.create_by,c.create_date from tb_course c right join tb_history h on c.course_id = h.course_id where c.structure_id = #{structureId} and h.create_by = #{userId} and c.status = ${0} ORDER BY h.create_date desc limit 1
